EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Attended - Canada
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Attending the VisiCAD 5.2 Training Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Thanks for Attending! VisiCAD 5.2 Training Seminar Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Client}},
I wanted to take this opportunity to personally thank you for attending the VisiCAD 5.2 Training Seminar. We hope that you found the information valuable. Please help us by taking a short survey <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_3dzt1NDVpUInoIA> (survey link: https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_3dzt1NDVpUInoIA <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_3dzt1NDVpUInoIA>) to tell us about your experience.
For your reference, we've included links to our training documents and applicable Release Notes:
- VisiCAD Regional Training Overview <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VisiCADRegionalTraining5dot2_Canada.pdf> - VisiCAD 5.0 Release Notes <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VisiCAD_5.0.0_Release_Notes.pdf> - VisiCAD 5.1 Release Notes <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VisiCAD5.1.0ReleaseNotes.pdf> - VisiCAD 5.2 Release Notes <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Command%25205.2.0%2520Release%2520Notes.pdf>
We thank you for your participation.
Thanks,
Sally Olson-Nelson, Client Account Manager TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7358
